alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:49PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Coconino Counties through 515 PM MST... At 449 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hunter Creek, or 12 miles west of Forest Lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haigler Creek, Christopher Creek, Kohls Ranch, Hunter Creek, Bear Flat, Upper Tonto Creek Campground, Spillway Campground, Sharp Creek Campground, Forest Road 195 Campground, Mogollon Campground, Forest Road 9350 Campground, Rim Campground, Christopher Creek Campground, Woods Canyon Lake Campground, Crook Campground and Haigler Canyon Campground. This includes State Route 260 between mile markers 269 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
